name: fluval-manager
description: Web interface for my Fluval Edge

scripts.build: parallelshell 'npm run build:sources' 'npm run build:views' 'npm run build:css'
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:sources' 'npm run watch:views' 'npm run watch:css'
scripts.watch:sources: npm run build:sources && npm run build:sources -- -w
scripts.watch:views: npm run build:views && onchange 'views/**/*.pug' -- npm run build:views
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && npm run build:css -- -w
scripts.clean: npm run clean:build && npm run clean:tmp

author: Nicolas Bigot
